suggest.ext-filter: Required to use the Postgres database driver.
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (^3.5.1).
suggest.fakerphp/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (^1.21).
suggest.tune/console: Required to use the database commands (^10.0).
suggest.tune/events: Required to use the observers with Eloquent (^10.0).
suggest.tune/pagination: Required to paginate the result set (^10.0).
suggest.symfony/finder: Required to use Eloquent model factories (^6.2).
